title: Report Info (V1)
description: Information about the report the log entry is associated with (V1)

type.title: Reporter Type
type.description: Type of the reporter that generated the report

name.title: Reporter Name
name.description: Name of the reporter that generated the report

uri.title: URI
uri.description: URI reference to the output for the report. If a relative-uri, it is relative to the directory containing the report log file.
